questions:
What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A dinosaur sculpture with neon boots
D) A family gathering

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A person walking
B) A dinosaur sculpture
C) A building
D) A tree

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A person
C) A dinosaur sculpture
D) A lake

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A city skyline
B) More trees and greenery
C) A beach
D) A mountain range

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A river
B) A dinosaur sculpture
C) A bench
D) A car

What is the dinosaur sculpture wearing?
A) A hat
B) Sunglasses
C) Neon boots
D) A scarf

What type of footwear is highlighted in the sculpture?
A) Sneakers
B) Boots
C) Sandals
D) Barefoot

What color are the neon boots on the dinosaur sculpture?
A) Blue
B) Green
C) Red
D) Yellow

What can be seen behind the sculpture?
A) A building
B) More sculptures
C) Dense foliage
D) A playground

What is the dominant color in the background?
A) Blue
B) Green
C) Brown
D) Gray

What kind of dinosaur is depicted in the sculpture?
A) T-Rex
B) Triceratops
C) Velociraptor
D) Unknown

What is the artistic element added to the sculpture?
A) A hat
B) Neon lighting
C) Paint
D) Water feature

What is the condition of the surrounding vegetation?
A) Dry and sparse
B) Lush and green
C) Covered in snow
D) Brown and withered

What kind of lighting is used on the sculpture?
A) Natural sunlight
B) Spotlights
C) Neon lights
D) Candlelight

What is the direction the dinosaur sculpture is facing?
A) Towards the camera
B) Away from the camera
C) To the left
D) To the right

What is the texture of the sculpture?
A) Smooth
B) Rough
C) Polished
D) Metallic

What kind of artistic style does the sculpture represent?
A) Realistic
B) Abstract
C) Surreal
D) Minimalist

What is the primary color of the sculpture itself?
A) Blue
B) Dark Green
C) Brown
D) Gray

What is the position of the dinosaur's tail?
A) Curled up
B) Straight out
C) Hanging down
D) Wrapped around its body

What is the primary source of light in the photo?
A) Sunlight
B) Street lamps
C) Neon lights
D) Flashlight

What is the texture of the vegetation in the foreground?
A) Smooth
B) Spiky
C) Leafy
D) Bare

What is the position of the dinosaur's head?
A) Looking down
B) Looking up
C) Looking straight ahead
D) Turned to the side

What is the primary focus of the neon lights on the sculpture?
A) The tail
B) The head
C) The feet
D) The body

What kind of artistic technique is used in the sculpture?
A) Carving
B) Painting
C) Molding
D) Welding

What is the relationship between the sculpture and the plants?
A) The plants overshadow the sculpture
B) The sculpture stands out among the plants
C) The plants hide the sculpture
D) The sculpture is part of the plants
